meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Geneviève LeClerc Jerry Slowik Anthony Niblett Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6739.

td.p: Geneviève LeClerc, a graduate student and sales manager from Lake Forest Park, Washington
Jerry Slowik, a writer from Arlington Heights, Illinois
Anthony Niblett, a law professor from Toronto, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,601)

tr.td: MARK TWAIN
"TOM" & "HUCK"
LIFE ON THE MISSISSIPPI
CELEBRATED JUMPING FROGS
THE PRINTS
THE PAUPER

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Twain took "a journey around the world" in his fifth & last travel book, "Following" this imaginary line')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Twain took "a journey around the world" in his fifth & last travel book, "Following" this imaginary line
